name: Networking Toolbox
description: 100+ offline-first networking tools and utilities. Networking Toolbox is a self-hosted application focused on network, tools, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Networking Toolbox on your home server to 100+ offline-first networking tools and utilities without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Networking Toolbox to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
